description: This file defines the TavilyTools class, a wrapper around the TavilyClient API for web search functionalities, including methods for performing searches and formatting results.

classes.name: TavilyTools
classes.description: A toolkit class that provides methods to perform web searches using the Tavily API, with configurable options for search depth, result formatting, and API key management.

methods.name: web_search_using_tavily
methods.description: Performs a web search using the Tavily API and returns results formatted as JSON or Markdown.

methods.name: web_search_with_tavily
methods.description: Retrieves search context from Tavily API for a given query, returning a JSON string of results.
